sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.AffectedUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>AffectedUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AffectedUtils = Class.create();
AffectedUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	hasAffected : function(taskGR, table, field) {
		var affectedGR = new GlideRecord(table);
		affectedGR.setLimit(1);
		affectedGR.addQuery(field, taskGR.sys_id);
		affectedGR.query();
		if (affectedGR.getRowCount() > 0)
			return true;
		
		return false;
	},
	
    type: 'AffectedUtils'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>sean.bowrin@snc</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-10-26 23:12:21</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>37f814d06ffa220025c42fceae3ee425</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>AffectedUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Subscription Based Notifications" source="com.glide.notification">52dc70c36d2220100acb70b353433038</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_37f814d06ffa220025c42fceae3ee425</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>sean.bowrin@snc</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-10-27 01:04:53</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>391</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
